message.entry: Value for parameter {0} must be a scalar or two-element vector.
Number of rows and columns in {0} must be the same as that in {1} .
Either the number of color channels in {0} must be the same as that in {1}, or {2} must be a standard binary, grayscale, or RGB image.
Value specified for ''{0}'' must be a smaller than the size of the image.
